LanguageData.IgnoreToDDesc: Ignores the allowed time of day restrictions on songs when enabled.
LanguageData.IgnoreASDesc: Ignores the allowed seasons restrictions on songs when enabled.
LanguageData.UseClassic: Use the classic player over new one.
LanguageData.UseClassicDesc: Switches use over to the classic player rather than using the new one. Please note: If you have the full display up, you will need to go to the mini display and go back to the full display to get the classic display to show.
LanguageData.EnableAllStationDesc: Enables the All Music Station, which is a collection of all the music loaded by RimRadio. (Restart Required.)
LanguageData.ResetLabel: Reset's every setting saved by RimRadio.
LanguageData.ShuffleDesc: Enable/disable the shuffling of the station's tracks.
LanguageData.HideInsteadMiniDesc: Miniplayer button will hide the player instead of switching to the mini version of the player.
LanguageData.PlayerHueSliderDesc: Changes the hue of the player's background.
LanguageData.PlayerSaturationSliderDesc: Changes the saturation of the color of the player's background.
LanguageData.PlayerValueSliderDesc: Changes how dark the background of the player is.
LanguageData.PlayerAlphaSliderDesc: Changes how transparent the background of the player is.
LanguageData.HighlightHueSliderDesc: Changes the hue of the player's background.
LanguageData.HighlightSaturationSliderDesc: Changes the saturation of the color of the player's background.
LanguageData.HighlightValueSliderDesc: Changes how dark the background of the player is.
LanguageData.HighlightAlphaSliderDesc: Changes how transparent the background of the player is.
